credit_line: Gift of Richard F. Holmes, Class of 1946
dimensions:
Overall:  11 3/4 x 9 in. (29.8 x 22.9 cm)

title: "There was snow in the street and rain in the sky".  [New York, 1952]. Written by Ralph T. Ward.  Illustrated by Andy Warhol.  Page 2 of 18 unbound pages with original blotted ink line drawings and pencil captions on paper.  Warhol's original manuscript
medium: ink and pencil on paper; page from book
